definition: Yemelyan Ivanovich Pugachov (1742-1775), Russian Cossack, leader of peasant rebellion 1773-1775 against Catherine the Great
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

sentences.english: During Pugachev’s uprising the plant was again ravaged and destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 在普加喬夫的叛亂期間，工廠再次遭到摧毀和破壞。

sentences.english: Peter, at the intercession of old savelitch, was spared by pougatcheff.
sentences.chinese: 由於老僕沙威裏奇的求情，彼得被普加喬夫赦免了。
